content.rendered:
Directed by Lal Jose.

Written by Benny P. Nayarambalam.

Cast Mohanlal(Prof. Fr. Michael Idikkula). Anoop Menon(Bullet Viswan). Arun Kurian(Sameer). Sarath Kumar(Franklin). Reshma Rajan(Mary). Chemban Vinod Jose(Kakka Rameshan). Salim Kumar(Prof. Premraj Damodaran). Shivaji Guruvayoor(Fr. George Kattuparamban). Priyanka Nair(Jayanthi). Vijay Babu(Self – Film Producer) . Binu Adimali(Villager). Jaise Jose(Villager). Jude Anthany Joseph(Koshy). Krishna Kumar(Cinematographer). Alencier Ley Lopez(Vareed). Prasad Muhamma(Franklin’s Father). Krishna Padmakumar(College Student). Jagan Reju(Benjamin). Nisthar Sait(Idikkula Thomman). Mafia Sasi(Stunt Master). Angel Shijoy(Anna Rajan (voice)). Siddique(Mathan Tharakan). Sneha Sreekumar(Anumol). Subeesh Sudhi(College Peon). Venkitesh V.P.(College Student).Amira Varma

Language Malayalam.

Producer Antony Perumbavoor.

Production Aashirvad Cinemas.
